section.heading: Requirement to share information.
section.text: District agencies that manage, administer, oversee, or fund workforce development or adult education programs covered pursuant to § 32-1622(c) shall transmit to the WIC the information necessary to create the guide no later than 60 days after receiving a request from the WIC for such information; provided, that:

para.text: An agency shall not be required to disclose information specifically protected from disclosure to another agency pursuant to District or federal law;
An agency shall not be required to transmit individual-level or personally identifiable information without a legally executed memorandum of understanding or similar legal instrument;
All agencies shall comply with all relevant privacy laws and no personally identifiable information shall be publicly released or made publicly available; and
The Public Charter School Board shall not be required to transmit the information required by this subchapter, although the WIC may request such information from the Public Charter School Board.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-95: § 301 of D.C. Law 22-95 provided that the creation of this section by § 103 of D.C. Law 22-95 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-95: § 301 of D.C. Law 22-95 provided that the creation of this section by § 103 of D.C. Law 22-95 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7030 of D.C. Law 22-168 repealed section 301 of D.C. Law 22-95 amending the applicability restriction impacting this section. Therefore the creation of this section by D.C. Law 22-95 has been implemented.
